title: How do I tell if i'm banned without downloading LoL

replies.body: An email is sent to the email registered to the account if a suspension occurs.  We'd be happy to help out and answer any concerns about your account!  Please reach out to us by[ submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we can clarify!

You should receive an email if you are banned, though sometimes it doesn't go through or you don't have access to the email etc. If you need to, you can submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), but it can take up to 3 days to receive a response.
